edu.ucsb.cs56.drawings.utilities

类 ShapeTransforms

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.drawings.utilities.ShapeTransforms

  • public class ShapeTransforms
extends Object
    Some static methods for transforming objects that implement the java.awt.Shape interface
    版本:
    for CS56, W16, UCSB, 01/19/2016
    作者:
    Phill Conrad
    另请参阅:
    Shape

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ShapeTransforms() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Shape horizontallyFlippedCopyOf(Shape s)
      A static method to flip a shape horizontally
      static Shape rotatedCopyOf(Shape s, double angleInRadians)
      A static method to rotate a shape around its center
      static Shape scaledCopyOf(Shape s, double sx, double sy)
      A static method to scale a shape with respect to the upper left hand corner of its bounding box.
      static Shape scaledCopyOfLL(Shape s, double sx, double sy)
      A static method to scale a shape with respect to the lower left hand corner of its bounding box.
      static Shape translatedCopyOf(Shape s, double tx, double ty)
      A static method to translate a shape
      static Shape verticallyFlippedCopyOf(Shape s)
      A static method to flip a shape horizontally

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ShapeTransforms

        public ShapeTransforms()

    • 方法详细资料

      • horizontallyFlippedCopyOf

        public static Shape horizontallyFlippedCopyOf(Shape s)
        A static method to flip a shape horizontally
        参数:
        s - A shape (could be a Rectangle, GeneralPath, etc.--anything that implements the Shape interface )
        返回:
        A copy of the Shape, flipped vertically

      • verticallyFlippedCopyOf

        public static Shape verticallyFlippedCopyOf(Shape s)
        A static method to flip a shape horizontally
        参数:
        s - A shape (could be a Rectangle, GeneralPath, etc.--anything that implements the Shape interface )
        返回:
        A copy of the Shape, flipped vertically

      • translatedCopyOf

        public static Shape translatedCopyOf(Shape s,
                                     double tx,
                                     double ty)
        A static method to translate a shape
        参数:
        s - A shape (could be a Rectangle, GeneralPath, etc.--anything that implements the Shape interface )
        tx - how far to translate in x direction
        ty - how far to translate in y direction
        返回:
        A copy of the Shape, translated

      • scaledCopyOf

        public static Shape scaledCopyOf(Shape s,
                                 double sx,
                                 double sy)
        A static method to scale a shape with respect to the upper left hand corner of its bounding box.
        参数:
        s - A shape (could be a Rectangle, GeneralPath, etc.--anything that implements the Shape interface )
        返回:
        A copy of the Shape, scaled with respect to its upper left corner

      • scaledCopyOfLL

        public static Shape scaledCopyOfLL(Shape s,
                                   double sx,
                                   double sy)
        A static method to scale a shape with respect to the lower left hand corner of its bounding box.
        参数:
        s - A shape (could be a Rectangle, GeneralPath, etc.--anything that implements the Shape interface )
        返回:
        A copy of the Shape, scaled with respect to its upper left corner

      • rotatedCopyOf

        public static Shape rotatedCopyOf(Shape s,
                                  double angleInRadians)
        A static method to rotate a shape around its center
        参数:
        s - A shape (could be a Rectangle, GeneralPath, etc.--anything that implements the Shape interface )
        返回:
        A copy of the Shape, rotated around its center
